Name: Korean BBQ Simulator
About the game: Korean BBQ Simulator Test your grilling skills in this fun and wacky - *cough* I mean, totally realistic physics-based meat grilling game based on Korean cuisine. This passion-project is a revival and re-envisioning of the classic Yakiniku and Meat Grilling games that were popular in Korea and Japan. Different Modes for the Brave Challenge yourself with three different difficulties, three different modes, and a plethora of meats to cook. Take Control and Turn Up the Heat Meats cook at different rates, be sure to adjust the grill's heat to match the type of meat you are cooking! Eating raw or burnt meat can result in a penalty to your score and a stomach ache! Learn to master cooking multiple meats at the same time for maximum points! Become the Ultimate Korean BBQ Master Compete in online leaderboards against your friends, or even strangers around the world.
